cz.zcu.validator.jdparser.data

Class JavaDocFilesFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.validator.jdparser.data.JavaDocFilesFinder

  • public class JavaDocFilesFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Design pattern - Library class. Helping class for getting files with JavaDoc information from given folder.
    Author:
    Stepan Cais, scais@kiv.zcu.cz, 3.12.2012

    • Field Summary

      Name of file, where are saved information about all classes.

      Name of file, where are saved information about all classes.
      private static int DEFAULT_CLASS_INF_FILE_INDEX
      If ALLCLASSES_FRAME_HTML or ALLCLASSES_NOFRAME_HTML are found, both of them contain information about classes.

      String constant for html element 'a'.
      private static java.lang.String HTML_TAG_HREF
      String constant for html element 'href'.

      • DEFAULT_CLASS_INF_FILE_INDEX

        private static final int DEFAULT_CLASS_INF_FILE_INDEX
        If ALLCLASSES_FRAME_HTML or ALLCLASSES_NOFRAME_HTML are found, both of them contain information about classes. It is not important which file is used for gathering information.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getJavaDocClassFiles

        public static java.util.Collection<java.io.File> getJavaDocClassFiles(java.io.File javaDocDir)
                                                               throws JavaDocParsingException
        Finds all JavaDoc class files in given folder. Firstly check, whether ALLCLASSES_FRAME_HTML or ALLCLASSES_NOFRAME_HTML are in given folder. If so, opens one of this file and extract information about class html files into list of files and returns this list.
        Parameters:
        javaDocDir - Folder with JavaDoc files.
        Returns:
        Collection of files. Every file in this collection is real html file, which represents one class.
        Throws:
        JavaDocParsingException - If ALLCLASSES_FRAME_HTML or ALLCLASSES_NOFRAME_HTML do not exist in given folder, or any exception during reading these files occur, or if files mentioned in these files do not exist, this exception is thrown.

      • find

        private static void find(java.io.File adr,
        java.util.List<java.io.File> list)
        Recursively goes through all folders of given folder and looks after ALLCLASSES_FRAME_HTML or ALLCLASSES_NOFRAME_HTML files.
        Parameters:
        adr - Parent folder, all subfolders of this folder will be searched.
        list - List with found files.
